text: I love finding treasures in this store! It is my favorite local antique store, and I visit it frequently. They have even recently added a clothing boutique in the back!

name: Dillon Hollis
text:
There was a decent amount of stuff to choose from.
Nothing of which i was looking for.
It doesn’t have that “thrift store smell” otherwise I would have given it a 5 star review instead of a 4.

resp.text: Thank you Dillion. Please check out our two Florence locations next time. They are located at 405 N. Mall Ct, Florence, AL 35630 and 3510 Cloverdale Rd., Florence, AL 35633.

text:
Visited store fire the first time 5-21-20 and found it to be a great shopping experience!
Great selection and staff!

resp.text: Thank you!

text: Really good thrift store really good prices will go back again!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Robin Featherston
text: I am amazed how clean the items are. Most thrift stores have a funky smell and I end up sneezing. Loaves and Fishes is a nice change.

name: Ann K. Darcy
text: Wonderful as always. It has never not been a pleasurable experience.

name: Tammi Hayes
text: Had changed.. Way to high on their stuff! Use to love it. Not now

name: Zachary Stanfield
text: For a small place they have a pretty good selection

name: Jenn Tittle
text: I have worked at Loaves and Fishes for over 2 years now and I love my job and the customers are amazing.

name: Edth Stearns
text: Really clean. Employees great,very friendly.

name: Stephanie English
text: Nicely organized. Employees are super friendly

name: Caitlin Davis
text: The sweetest most caring people

name: Kelli Lovelace
text: Great thrift store. Very organized.

name: mercymade8
text:
Everything has changed in the Loaves & Fishes stores they look nice but the prices have went up. From what i gather, management has changed.
I used to would shop at several of the locations at least once a week. I would pick up things for others who were in need as well. If it didnt work for them at thrift prices i could afford to buy it & put it back til i found someone who could wear/use it.
Now I can't afford to do that. The last time I went shopping there, I came back with 3 used clothing items which cost me around $15. My mom came over with new clothes she had gotten on sell fot $1 at Walmart. The point of thrifting is being thrifty. JCPenny's & other department stores has new clothes for clearance around these prices.
I enjoy the "treasure seeking" process of going to the thrift store but it is more fun when the treasure wasn't wrestling for a spot in your budget.
I'm not the only one who feels this way. The parking lots used to stay full of customers. Now nit nearly as much traffic goes through there to weed through the donated goods. Thankfully there are more & more options popping up around our area.
I will still go by there sometimes but not my go to spots anymore.

name: Linda Roberts
text: The prices are getting too high for me. Their prices was reasonable but not worth the drive now

name: Keda Johnson
text: Some things are over priced. But overall good store to get used items.

name: Leah Brewer
text: Very well organized shop.

name: Jessica Blevins
text: Clean, kind staff, no trash.

name: Margie Cochran
text: Very friendly and helpful

name: Brandy Dennis

text: I like the store but all of the loaves and fishes in this area are way over priced for thrift stores.

text: They add so much to the community

name: Michael Smith
text: Thrift store

name: Brittany Kendrick
text:
Love this shop! Matilda was happy to help me try on dresses and patient with my indecision (they're all so pretty!) when it came to shopping on a budget. These dresses are well made and the other accessories she sells are really cool and nerd friendly!
The owner, Matilda was a really great lady to talk to. Very optimistic and encouraging. I can tell she loves her work.

name: Jose Vasquez
text: Retrofitt is the coolest place for clothing in Huntsville.

name: Eirekat t
text: I love this store! I am all about that retro look and she has so many different styles and accessories, I feel like I am in heaven! Prices are fair quality is wonderful and the customer service is spectacular!!!

name: winterelm
text: We just absolutely LOVE Retro-Fitt Boutique.   If you like Dresses, and shoes in that 50's or steampunk look, then Ladies, this is the place for you.  They also carry themed items, like wallets, purses, scarves, socks. The list goes on and on.  Don't see anything you like?  Well the owner can design and make you a dress to your liking.

name: Anahi Santos
text: Beautiful store great service . Google just needs to update the location they are NOT In bridge street anymore they’re located on Old Manrovia Dr. address is correct but the image and info is NOT .

name: lisa greene
text: I had a lovely experience.  Popped in after walking down bridgestreet and saw a little slice of Retro Heaven.  Quirky dresses great shoes.  I can't say thank you enough to Matilda for bringing Fashions Latest Styles from Overseas and New York.  BRAVO!!!!

name: Lenore Corey
text: Adorable clothes, but was disappointed the store does not have gift certificates (I needed one for my daughter). Also, the  music that was playing was current, not retro, gave a disjointed feeling to the shop...

text:
Where are you now??
Not a bridge street anymore. :(

resp.text: We moved to 930 Old Monrovia Road, ste #6, Huntsville, AL 35806. We are in the same plaza as Stars and Strikes. Our shop is right next to State Farm

text: Loved it simply loved it great place to visit

name: James Truffa

name: Joe Hattery
text: Lots of things

name: Martina Smith
text:
Love this place!!!
I thoroughly enjoyed my visit to the Goody Vault! When I entered the showroom it felt as if I was going on an adventure back in time. The shop has a very nostalgic feel to it, it was also extremely organized and clean. There is a wide variety of vintage items to choose from and the owner is very knowledgeable about each piece. He also took the time to explain the history of these pieces as well. I would definitely recommend this shop and I can't wait to go back to explore and shop again.

resp.text: Martina! You are too kind. Thank you for your feedback. Please come see us again. We were honored to have your visit. Can’t wait to see you again.

name: Natalia Lopez-Thismon
text: This place is a one of a kind experience. The shop is in the basement of the building, making it feel like you’re actually walking into a vault. Manny, the owner, has items you’ve never seen before! He’s extra attentive to his customers and makes sure that everyone gets an amazing experience at his shop. He’s also knowledgeable about the pieces and will tell you how you can tell the age of items. I love all the cool finds here.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the thorough review, Natalia! We’re very grateful for your visit and for supporting our small business, it means everything to us. You are truly amazing. Please come see us again—anytime!

name: Keyton Fike
text: The absolute best vintage clothing store in Huntsville, period. The store is Intimate, fun, unique, and INSPIRING! Manny (owner & operator) is very knowledgeable about the history of every piece in the showroom, and even does vintage clothing repair! Always a great experience. Take my advice and experience this gem. A+++

resp.text: Keyton!! Thank you so much for the thorough review. We are grateful to have you have a client. Really appreciate your business and encouragement. Come back and see us soon!😎

name: Kevin Richardson
text: A must go in Downtown Huntsville! Awesome curated selection of pieces from Early 1900's - Current . It's not just the pieces available, it's the experience from the owner and the story behind the pieces of clothing that makes it a great place to visit! If you love history,fashion or just a really cool place to check out,stop by. You won't be disappointed!!

resp.text: Kevin! We are so grateful for your thorough review. It’s all about the experience for sure! Can’t wait to have you visit again. Thanks for your support!

name: Janelle Howell
text: Shopping in the goody vault was like taking a step back in time! From the ancient Coca Cola vending machine, to the fresh prince of bel air like sweat jackets, to the international and middle eastern rugs. My fave item from the vault is my tye dye shirt which I wear all the time! Can’t wait to get another vintage and stylish clothing item next time I visit.

resp.text: Janelle! Thank you for the amazing review! We’re grateful that you had an amazing time and that you’re enjoying that tie dye shirt. Much more to come! Thanks for supporting our business.

name: Geraldine Dry
text: It is appointment based only which is great, because you have the Vault to yourself with Emanuel the owner as your guide! AH-mazing!!! There is an old school soda machine to quench your thirst while shopping these timeless pieces. A must go if you are in Huntsville!! The Owner Emanuel is very knowledgeable about vintage clothing even to the stitching he can tell you what year it was made super cool!

resp.text: G!! You are AHH-amazing. Thank you for supporting our business and for your positivity. You’re the ultimate cheerleader. Come see us again soon!

name: Ric Means
text: This is place is a vibe...a real experience. Fair prices, great selection of vintage, and knowledgeable owner with new items updated regularly. This is one of a kind. Also, shipping is fast and easy if you’re not in hsv.

resp.text: Rich!! You have a been a day 1 supporter and we cannot thank you enough. You are always welcome in the shop and we will always knew you fresh. See you soon!

name: Matt Pittman
text: Goody Vault is something Huntsville, AL has needed for a long time. I used to have to go to other bigger cities to get the style they offer. Such a great experience all around. A must visit spot.

resp.text: Pitman! Thank you for the kind review! We honored to collaborate with such a talented visual artist and we cannot wait to see what the future holds. Come see us soon!

name: Z J
text: Love this shop. Great selection of vintage shirts, pants & jackets. Manny is super cool and is always very accommodating. Book an appointment asap!

resp.text: ZJ! Thanks for the awesome review. Can’t wait to have you visit again!

name: Laura Hurst
text: Great place to find the most unique vintage items!  Manny is great with finding your size, mending, and all around making sure you look amazing.  Can't recommend this place enough.

resp.text: Laura, thank you for the review! We appreciate you and your business. Can’t wait to have you visit again. Keep being amazing, oh Chandler too!

name: Keenan Tipton
text: Goody Vault has the BEST collection of vintage gear! A passionate owner who works endlessly to curate the best selection. If you haven't checked out the Goody Vault showroom you have to go!

resp.text: Keenan thanks for the kind words! We definitely strive to create a memorable experience. Looking forward to seeing you back here soon! ⚡️

name: Fow Wow
text:
They say Hsv is a melting pot of people and culture. Goody Vault is like the cherry on top. Such a unique spot with history, style and knowledge being dropped from E-Baby. Hit up the vintage Dr Pepper machine and save me one.

Always good to see a small business grow in the Hsv area and even cooler when the owner is just an awesome person.

-Fowler

resp.text: FOW TO THE WOW! Thanks my man. We’re trying to make Huntsville a more cultured and diverse city. Come back and see us soon in the shop. We’ll have a bottle of our finest Napa Cabernet waiting for you. 🍾😅

name: Brenton Harrison
text: “positive vibes... a fair man with a keen eye and fine taste = goody vault.  if you know... you know”

resp.text: Wow. What an honor! Thank you Brenton. Hope to see you back in the shop soon! 🏆

name: jungleshorts
text: My guy doing it. One of a kind. ⭐️💙💘🦀

resp.text: We are trying our best! Thanks for your support and positivity. We’ll be sure to have some Elton John playing for you when you come back. “Hold me closer tiny dancer”🎶

name: Larry Lowe
text: Thoroughly enjoy my first visit to The Goody Vault!  Manny's passion behind the second-hand and vintage clothing movement is fascinating. There are two stories that Manny brings to light with each piece of clothing. Story 1 - Who made the piece? From the industrial denims of early century to the thick leather jackets of more modern times. The function and fashion in the creation of a piece tells a story. Story 2 - who wore the piece? Were they left or right handed? Was it a heavily worn item  to get a job done, or an heirloom treasure well taken care of. The wear and tear and state of the piece also tells a cool story. Get in touch with Manny and learn more about the Second-hand and Vintage clothing wave that is growing!

resp.text: Wow. What a honor! Thank you for sharing your experience and we really appreciate your  support. Come back anytime!

name: Jordon Brown
text:
One of the best vintage clothing stores I have been to. The owner, Manny, has an eye for great pieces and is more then happy to help you.

He is cataloguing the history of America here. Also, be sure to ask him about the history of the pieces!

I check back monthly and go on his website weekly because he is always getting in near items.

resp.text: Thank you Jordon. We are grateful for your support. You are welcome to visit the Vault anytime! Keep being awesome.

name: Eugene Govan
text: Manny is a great guy and always has something new and interesting when I visit. Really gives me the feeling I'm going to a real vault every time. Would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Happy we could have you visit the shop. Come see us again Eugene!

name: The DapperDude Collection
text: Going to the goody vault is like taking a trip back in history. I love visiting and exploring at the goody vault. Always find something interesting and unique.

resp.text: Thank you! What an honor hearing that from the most dapper guy in Huntsville. We really appreciate your support.

name: Amy Romero
text: Absolutely love Gingers! They are always so sweet and friendly. I’ve found so many cute and stylish clothes and a few purses. If ginger doesn’t have what you’re looking for, she always does whatever she can to try and make you happy! Highly recommend.

name: Lauren Aldridge
text: Everything is very fair priced. Generally very good quality,

name: Paula Norman
text: I purchased a coach purse today. I was very satisfied with the customer service and the price. I highly recommend GINGER'S CONSIGNMENT SHOP. I will definitely be shopping there for my handbags and accessories.

name: Debra Higdon
text: Gingers offers great selection at good fair prices.  Friendly staff are on hand to assist and guide.  Awesome accessories.  One of my favorite stores of all time!! Every visit offers new finds!! Love it! Great job Ginger and staff!

name: gina ingram
text:
If you like upscale consignment shoppers, Gingers in Auburn is the place to go! Suede pants: not $80.. $40 &. Soft purple-lavender leather jacket on the $$
low-low!Frye boots: $50.
good stuff!

name: Barrett Wilson
text: Never been there, but I’ve heard awful things about the “owner”

name: Desminique Rowell
text: I have found a new GEM in Auburn!!! I like the quality clothes. I love the $3 sales. She also have nice stuff for a very great price!!! She also have some nice purses. I am a purse fanatic!!!

name: Elaine Hyland
text: What a wonderful consignment store! Reasonably priced, great selection and such nice staff! I'll be back😃

name: Tiara Bond
text: All the employees are super helpful and there are tons of great pieces. I never leave empty handed or feeling like I spent too much. Definitely my favorite consignment shop.

name: Brooke Davis
text: Great store! Found a very nice Coach purse for a great pricw and the clothing was all in great condition!! Will be shoppinghere again soon.

name: Taylor Mallicoat
text: I took multiple large bag of clothes in there for her to look at, and as soon as she saw a Fringe Consignment Shop receipt that was left in a bag she stopped looking completely and said she couldn't take any of it. She didn't even look through 95% of my items. If she can't be bothered to look through the stuff I brought there, I can't be bothered to shop there anymore.

resp.text:
As a former employee of Fringe, I have experience with their policies and hold the same standards for items that I accept.  Basically, I accept current styles, in good condition, that I have an immediate need for in my inventory.  I do not accept casual items (sweatshirts and t-shirts) or items that show excessive wear. When my quality standards are met, any rejection is based on the needs of our store and should not be taken personally.

Taylor, I remember this specific visit and urge you to try again, possibly before taking your items elsewhere.

name: Patrick reed
text: Great customer service and a great place to shop

name: Sherri Tucker
text: Love Ginger’s! It is a must stop whenever I come in town from South Florida! I have sold & bought from here and have always had a wonderful experience!!

resp.text: Thanks, Sherri!

name: Nina Hollingsworth
text: Love this store! In addition to clothing, they have tons of accessories like jewelry, scarves, handbags, and hats. They sell clothes that cater to a broader demographic... not just college kids. They consign men's clothing also!

name: Haley G
text: Ginger's Consignment is the best store for everyone! They have such a great collection of in style clothes! Its a great store for college girls who need amazing clothes for a great price. Ginger's has is now become my number one clothing store.

name: AmySue Reilly
text:
A great place to stop in and find some great bargains! Ginger and Amanda offer their stylish opinions... true and straight forward! Does help cut down on what one purchases! Thanks for a great afternoon Ginger and Amanda. You will have a great time and will NOT be disappointed.

Encourage y'all to stop in at "Ginger's Consignment Shop" . You will enjoy searching through the "treasures" to find your "gems" and enjoy the company as well while having a have a great time; again... you will NOT BE disappointed.

Ginger's Consignment Shop is on 1360 2nd Ave Opelika, AL 36801 ...

See More

name: Tig Tig
text: My mother was in the store for more than 5 minutes but instead of coming to over help the employees ignored her and one even proceeding to walk past her without a hello.  The other costomer who was a non person of color was acknowledged, greated and helped. They Lost out on a sale. Never will return or reccomend.

name: Susanna Campbell
text: Great selection of clothes and accessories plus great service and prices.

name: Amy Smith
text: This was my first visit. It was worth it!!! Great prices, nice environment, and friendly help!!

name: Lisa Harry Nathan
text: Friendly, well-designed shop with high quality consignments.

name: Lil But Fierce
text: Love this place!! Ginger is very sweet!

name: Robbin Reed
text: So many wonderful items to choose from.

name: Laura Fant
text: Not acknowledged for over 5 minutes & we were the only customers present!  Too pricey for resale boutique & a bit rude

resp.text: Laura, I apologize for your experience.  Could you let me know when you were in the store, so that I can investigate and ensure that this doesn't happen again? I hope that you'll give us another chance!

name: Z “Zero” B
text: Great service and a large selection of clothes, shoes, and accessories.

name: Senna Simmons Barnett
text: Great place to shop

name: Billy Traylor
text: Expensive consignment shop.

resp.text: Billy, as I'm not a thrift store, my items may seem high in comparison. But I only carry items in excellent, 'like new' condition and my prices are based on quality, brand, and the local market. It's disappointing that your budget dictated a negative rating for a small, local business. GW

name: ZolaandPhoona A.N.W.
text: Gingers is wonderful!!!!
